mapper.sql: id, url, orderNum, parentId, number, longNumber, name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description, modelId, bizModelName
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO im_resource ( id, url, orderNum, parentId, number, longNumber, name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description, modelId, bizModelName ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{url}, #{orderNum}, #{parentId}, #{number}, #{longNumber}, #{name}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{description}, #{modelId}, #{bizModelName} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE im_resource
url = #{url},
orderNum = #{orderNum},
parentId = #{parentId},
number = #{number},
longNumber = #{longNumber},
name = #{name},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
description = #{description},
modelId = #{modelId},
bizModelName = #{bizModelName},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE im_resource
url = #{map.url},
orderNum = #{map.orderNum},
parentId = #{map.parentId},
number = #{map.number},
longNumber = #{map.longNumber},
name = #{map.name},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
description = #{map.description},
modelId = #{map.modelId},
bizModelName = #{map.bizModelName},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO im_resource ( id, url, orderNum, parentId, number, longNumber, name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description, modelId, bizModelName ) VALUES ( #{map.id}, #{map.url}, #{map.orderNum}, #{map.parentId}, #{map.number}, #{map.longNumber}, #{map.name}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.description}, #{map.modelId}, #{map.bizModelName} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM im_resource
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND url like CONCAT('%', #{url} , '%')
AND orderNum like CONCAT('%', #{orderNum} , '%')
AND parentId like CONCAT('%', #{parentId} , '%')
AND number like CONCAT('%', #{number} , '%')
AND longNumber like CONCAT('%', #{longNumber} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{description} , '%')
AND modelId like CONCAT('%', #{modelId} , '%')
AND bizModelName like CONCAT('%', #{bizModelName} , '%')
